meanings.definition: A place for the treatment of chronic diseases or for recuperation.
meanings.sent1: The sanatoria in the mountains provide a peaceful environment for healing.
meanings.sent2: Many people visit sanatoria by the sea to improve their health.
meanings.sent3: The sanatoria staff organized a funny talent show for the patients.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the sanatoria, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The colorful gardens outside the sanatoria created a serene atmosphere for recovery.

meanings.sent1: The brochures highlighted the various sanatoria available for booking.
meanings.sent2: Visiting different sanatoria around the world can be an enriching experience.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly referred to themselves as the 'sanatoria squad'.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with sanatoria, each offering unique services.
meanings.sent5: The map displayed all the sanatoria locations in bright colors for easy identification.
